name: Secure View™ Smart Garage Opener with Built-in Camera, Integrated Dual LED Lighting System, Ultra-Quiet Belt Drive®
description: The LiftMaster 84505R is a premium smart garage door opener with an integrated HD camera, 2-way audio, ultra-quiet belt drive, and bright dual LED lighting. Control and monitor your garage remotely via the myQ app.
shortDescription: Ultra-quiet belt drive smart opener with built-in camera, dual LED lights, and myQ connectivity.
features: Quiet and smooth operation with best-in-class belt drive system and DC motor
myQ® Connected: Control, secure, and monitor the garage from the myQ app anytime, from anywhere
Secure in-garage delivery: Enables Amazon Key In-Garage Delivery (free for Prime members)
Security+ 2.0®: Sends a new code with every remote click
myQ Diagnostics compatible: Real-time health reports and alerts
Invisible light beam safety system with auto-reverse
PosiLock® electronic protection against forced openings
Built-in 130° wide-angle HD camera with 2-way audio and night vision via myQ app
Integrated dual LED lighting: 1,500 lumens, long-lasting

specifications.mechanics: Steel chassis, T-rail and trolley, full reinforced belt drive (63:1 gear reduction), auto-force adjustment, electronic limits, DC Wi-Fi logic board
specifications.power: 120V AC, 60 Hz, 6A current rating, UL Listed

dimensions.head: 10.5" L x 12.72" W x 8.185" H (30" wide with doors open)

inTheBox: The Protector System® Safety Reversing Sensors
Assembled Solid-Steel Belt T-Rail (sold separately in some kits)
